attributes.action: allow non-British spouses of UK service personnel to be awarded UK citizenship.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We petition for the government to recognise the considerable sacrifices made by the spouses and children of armed forces and other service personnel for this country.

Many non-British members of service families are being denied citizenship in this country.

These service personnel and their families regard themselves as British, have built a life in Britain and in many cases have children who are British citizens. 

we urge the Government to reconsider its position towards service families wishing to remain in the country for which they have sacrificed so much.

government_responses.details:
